question: Securitization and Reconstruction of Financial Assets and Enforcement of Security Interest Act popularly known as SARFAESI Act was enacted in which of the following year ?
explanation: The full form of SARFAESI Act as we know is Securitisation and Reconstruction of Financial Assets and Enforcement of Security Interest Act, 2002. Banks utilize this act as an effective tool for bad loans (NPA) recovery. It is possible where non-performing assets are backed by securities
